post.title: Why SafeShore?
post.author: ssuslh1
post.content:
Why choose SafeShore you ask?  SafeShore is a unique program that can offer monoline Longshore Coverage and add in companion policies for State Act Workers’ Compensation and/or Maritime Employers Liability (MEL).

This program has the benefits of being a part of the country’s largest longshore provider without being assessable.  Claims are handled by Charles Taylor, TPA.  There’s one central accounting contact if you have USL&H only or include State Act and/or MEL.  Employers have the opportunity to participate in any of Signal’s Safety Training throughout the country and can access Safety Help on the website: https://www.signalmutual.com/safety-center/

The SafeShore Program has two options:
  1. Standard SafeShore – the accounts that fit this option are the smaller risks from $10,000 to $100,000 USL&H premium and “if any” to $1,000,000 in USL&H payroll.  
  2. SafeShore Edge – the accounts that fit this option are the risks that fall between Standard SafeShore and Signal Mutual.  These risks have over $100,000 USL&H premium or $1,000,000 in USL&H payroll.  This option also has the availability to participate in monthly self-audit reporting

No matter the size, Signal has an option for your Employer.  Visit our website for more information on SafeShore - http://www.signalsafeshore.com/.
